description: Make way for Conway’s coolest and coniest new take on sandwiches! Taking bread cones and filling them up with homemade scrumptiousness, this talented team’s menu features a savory selection of twisted creations, including…Here Piggy Piggy- signature mac n cheese and bacon!Tex Mex Mix- seasoned beef, carne guisada gravy, garlic rice, and gooey cheeseTwisted Cheeseburger- mac n cheese, ground beef, pickles, onion, spicy mustardAnd if this truck weren’t terrific enough, they’re donating 5% of all their profits to all the No Kill Shelters in Arkansas. For a blissfully tasty treat, come on out to Roxy’s Twisted Sandwiches.
name: Roxy's Twisted Sandwiches
